title: 8000contestdysadron 3

[[module CSS]]

.info-container .collapsible-block-folded a{
color: #FFF;}
.info-container .collapsible-block-unfolded-link a{
color: #FFF;
}

#page-content > .collapsible-block {
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    padding: .8em;
    background-color: #e3e3e3;
    border-top: 0.125rem dashed #b5b5b5;
    border-bottom: 0.125rem dashed #b5b5b5;
}

#page-content > .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-content {
    text-align: left;
}

#page-content .license-box .collapsible-block {

    display: unset;

    text-align: unset;

    padding: unset;

    background-color: unset;

    border-top: unset;

    border-bottom: unset;

}



#page-content .license-box .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-content {

    text-align: unset;

}

blockquote,
div.blockquote {
    border: 0.125rem solid #d4d4d4;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}

.interview{
    border:solid 2px #d4d4d4;
    text-align: left;
    background:#F5F5F5;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}


.wrapper{
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    padding: .8em;
    background-color: #e3e3e3;
    border-top: 0.125rem dashed #b5b5b5;
    border-bottom: 0.125rem dashed #b5b5b5;
}



#page-title{display:none}

[[=]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5935/warning.png]]
[[/=]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= 8992
|clearance= 2
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= uncontained
|secondary-icon= https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/uncontained-icon.svg
|disruption-class= ekhi
|risk-class= warning
]]


------

[[include component:image-block
        name= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-8992/Ezra.jpg|
        caption= Junior Researcher Ezra Johannsen, now deceased.|
        width=300px
    ]]
**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-8992 is currently uncontained.  The anomaly is being protected and hidden by Foundation staff members compromised by SCP-8992’s anomalous properties. Unaffected staff located at Site-216 are tasked with the destruction of the anomaly; staff are currently unauthorized to respond to anomalously compromised individuals with physical force, but this is under constant review. All orders received from former Site Co-Director Cameron are to be disregarded.

Until the current situation is resolved, Site-216 is operating at drastically reduced capabilities. Long term containment plans have been overridden by the neutralisation order due to the extent and impact of the anomaly upon the functioning of the Site and those stationed within. 

**Description:** SCP-8992 is the corpse of Foundation Junior Researcher Ezra Johannsen, aged 27 at death. SCP-8992’s idiopathic anomalous properties manifested on 23 June upon Johannsen’s death. Its anomalous property is that individuals will regard SCP-8992 as alive. Any evidence to the contrary is either undetectable or will be dismissed by compromised individuals: 
* Individuals will perceive SCP-8992 as communicating with them where no such communication exists. Hallucinations of this kind include SCP-8992 speaking and producing written text;
* Individuals will physically carry and move SCP-8992, and attribute such movement to the anomaly’s own locomotion;
* Evidence of SCP-8992’s lack of life will be dismissed, often in an irate and aggressive manner; 
* Affected individuals have been shown to misremember relevant events, including the actions of non-affected individuals regarding SCP-8992.

Affected staff have permitted no valid medical tests to be run on SCP-8992. Testing has been unable to commence due to the unauthorized theft and concealment of the anomaly. Affected staff have engaged in a site-wide game of Hide and Seek with a corpse, a game those of us who are unaffected are growing very tired of and **would like to cease immediately.**[[footnote]] Colloquial language authorized for use by Site Co-Director Cummings due to the aggravating nature of recent events. [[/footnote]] The corpse has experienced a delayed rate of putrefaction -- it is unknown if this is due to anomalous properties, or compromised staff members are attempting to preserve the body.

Not all individuals are susceptible to SCP-8992’s effects. It is estimated 48% of Site-216’s staff are affected and perceive the corpse as a still-living Junior Researcher Johannsen. This estimate cannot be trusted – it is currently believed certain individuals onsite perceive the anomaly as Johanssen, but claim otherwise in an attempt to aid in “Johannsen’s” survival.[[footnote]] We know who the spies are -- you talk to corpses, you're not subtle.[[/footnote]] 


**Timeline of Events:** 

[[table  style="border-collapse:collapse; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold; padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; color: white; background-color: #64030f; width: 12%;"]]
Date
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold; padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; color: white; background-color: #64030f; width: 88%;"]]
Event Description
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/23
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
Anomaly manifests with Johannsen's collapse, and eventual death, occurring in the Site cafeteria. As staff attempt to administer medical aid, several compromised individuals take physical custody of the corpse and abscond with it back to the dormitory wing.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/24
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
One of the affected individuals from the prior day's incident attempts to go swimming in the Site's recreation suite, whilst pulling SCP-8992 by the arm behind her. An intense verbal argument occurs between unaffected and compromised staff, as the former highlight the health implications of a corpse floating in the pool.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/25
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
As per standard protocol for deceased staff, the janitorial team begin emptying Johannsen's former dormitory room. A compromised staff member arrives at the room, carrying SCP-8992. The staff member claims outrage on the basis of SCP-8992 being alive. He throws the corpse at the lone janitor in attendance, knocking the janitor down. The compromised staff member quickly retreats, corpse in tow. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/26
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
Site-216 Co-Directors Eleanor Cameron and Nigel Cummings meet to discuss the anomaly. It becomes evident Cameron is affected by the anomaly and incorrectly perceives the corpse as alive. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/27
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
Cameron agrees to Cummings' request for the corpse to undergo medical testing to show it is deceased. Cameron accepts on the proviso she is the one to administer these tests. Video transcript of the encounter follows:
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; background-color: #F5F5F5; width: 100%;" colspan="2";]]
Site-216, Medical Bay. Director Cummings enters. SCP-8992 lies on a medical gurney, Electrode pads linked to an EKG machine have been embedded in the decomposing flesh of the corpse's chest. Director Cameron stands next to it.

Cameron presents Cummings with a stack of papers, none of which contain information pertinent to SCP-8992 or any medical tests performed. An argument ensues between the two staff.

Cameron directs Cummings to the EKG screen, which detects no heart rate. The argument escalates. To demonstrate SCP-8992's state, Cummings picks up a scalpel and makes a medical incision on the corpse's right thumb, amputating it. As expected, the corpse does not respond.

Cameron screams. She physically attacks Cummings, pushing him over. She pulls the EKG monitors off SCP-8992, and flees the room carrying the corpse. Immediately following this incident, both Cameron and Cummings issue sitewide communications disavowing one another and claiming sole leadership of the Site.[[footnote]] Given the obvious anomalous compromising of Cameron, Site leadership would have fallen to Cummings regardless. [[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/28
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
Given the extreme effect the anomaly has had on staff and the Site, Cummings orders affected members of staff to search for SCP-8992 room by room. Physical violence follows as divisions deepen between normal staff and those affected by the anomaly. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/29
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
The Site is placed under red-level quarantine by Overwatch Command.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
06/30
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
Cummings issues a directive to all staff to destroy SCP-8992 in an attempt to recover individuals cognitively compromised by the anomaly. Disgraced former Director Cameron initiates a lockdown of the Site armory due to her irrational fear the weapons may be used to kill an already deceased corpse.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 12%;"]]
07/01[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .75em .5em; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #d4d4d4; width: 88%;"]]
Compromised staff begin erecting barricades across the site to hinder the search for SCP-8992.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
@@@@
@@@@
= **Further updates to follow. Situation currently ongoing.**
@@@@
@@@@

------

= [[size 150%]] **Addendum 001: SCP-8992 "Interview" Log** [[/size]]

[[div class="interview"]]
**Foreword:** The following “interview” was arranged with SCP-8992 by former Site Co-Director Eleanor Cameron. It has been included within this file on the basis it effectively demonstrates the effects of the anomaly on compromised individuals.

------

//[SCP-8992 is located, slumped, on a chair at the interview room table, opposite former Site Co-Director Eleanor Cameron. The corpse's right hand is haphazardly covered in plasters, most of which are partially unstuck and dangle from the body.]//

**Cameron:** Given what’s just happened… are you sure you want to do this today, Ezra?

//[One minutes of silence.]//

**Cameron:** What for?

//[Ten seconds of silence.]//

//[SCP-8992’s head lurches forward. It limply hits the table.]//

//[Two minutes of silence.]//

**Cameron:** It's just... escalated from there.

//[A plaster fully peels away from SCP-8992's hand, and floats to the floor of the interview room. The lack of right thumb is exposed.]// 

**Cameron:** And… I think we should talk about today. I think you should record what happened.

//[Note: SCP-8992 was located on the day of the recording. The anomaly was accompanied by two affected individuals who were forcibly inserting bars of chocolate into the corpse’s mouth. In accordance with containment procedures, staff attempted to transport the anomaly to the crematorium for incineration. They were unsuccessful in this matter due to the intervention of compromised staff – Dir. Cummings.]//

**Cameron:** Ezra…

//[Cameron stands, and walks around to SCP-8992. She bends down and hugs the corpse.]//

//[Ten seconds of silence.]//

//[Putrefied liquid drips from SCP-8992’s eye sockets. It dampens Cameron’s shoulder.]//

**Cameron:** It’s okay. That’s enough for today, I think. Let’s get you out of here.

//[Still embracing the corpse, Cameron stands upright, pulling SCP-8992 with her. She drags the corpse across the room, its legs trailing against the floor, opens the door with her free hand, and leaves.]//
[[/div]]
